name: Here's The Kicker: Jam Edition
description:
Nidhogg without swords, as an endless runner.

Canabalt with face kicking.

Two descriptions that describe... What this game is *supposed* to be in the future.

Controls:

Left click to jump

Left click mid jump in order to divekick downward as an attack.

Currently Contains:

3 different enemies,

Random generation of levels and enemies,

Difficulty scaling as you progress,

PLACEHOLDER animations,

PLACEHOLDER sounds,

ONE soft-lock (don't break through TOO many glass plates in one level), and

NO final art assets.

Please note that this game is windows only.

VVV Music provided by Kevin MacLeod VVV

"Vortex" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

In seriousness though,

This game was made for #Myfirstgamejam, a game jam intended for absolute beginners, or those who have started and then abandoned projects without completing any, with the end goal being for each participant to learn something new about game development.

I would have loved to work on this game a lot more during the duration of the jam, but at the same time as this jam starting up was my first ever job.

Between a new job, several different life events, and my first real serious hunkering down for game development, I did not have nearly the time I was hoping for. But that's not stopping me. There's a good game in here somewhere, and I intend to find it.
